movies.title: Logan
movies.plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

poster.caption: Hugh Jackman in Logan (2017)

movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

poster.caption: Jeff Goldblum, Anthony Hopkins, Cate Blanchett, Idris Elba, Mark Ruffalo, Tom Hiddleston, Chris Hemsworth, and Tessa Thompson in Thor: Ragnarok (2017)

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movies.plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.

poster.caption: Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Chris Pratt, Michael Rooker, Zoe Saldaña, Dave Bautista, Karen Gillan, Pom Klementieff, and Elizabeth Debicki in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017)

movies.title: Get Out
movies.plot: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

poster.caption: Daniel Kaluuya in Get Out (2017)

movies.title: Dunkirk
movies.plot: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

poster.caption: Dunkirk (2017)

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.plot: Peter Parker tries to stop Adrian 'The Vulture' Toomes from selling weapons made with advanced Chitauri technology while trying to balance his life as an ordinary high school student.

poster.caption: Robert Downey Jr., Michael Keaton, and Tom Holland in Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.plot: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

poster.caption: Harrison Ford, Jared Leto, Ryan Gosling, and Ana de Armas in Blade Runner 2049 (2017)

movies.title: Wonder Woman
movies.plot: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

poster.caption: David Thewlis, Saïd Taghmaoui, and Gal Gadot in Wonder Woman (2017)

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi

movies.title: Coco

poster.caption: Alfonso Arau, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach, Gael García Bernal, Dyana Ortelli, Herbert Siguenza, and Anthony Gonzalez in Coco (2017)

movies.title: It
movies.plot: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

poster.caption: Bill Skarsgård and Jackson Robert Scott in It (2017)

movies.title: Baby Driver
movies.plot: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love, and freedom.

poster.caption: Kevin Spacey, Jamie Foxx, Jon Hamm, Eiza González, Lily James, and Ansel Elgort in Baby Driver (2017)

movies.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
movies.plot: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

poster.caption: Woody Harrelson, Frances McDormand, and Sam Rockwell in Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017)

movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
movies.plot: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

poster.caption: Keanu Reeves in John Wick: Chapter 2 (2017)

movies.title: Justice League
movies.plot: Steppenwolf and his Parademons return after eons to capture Earth. However, Batman seeks the help of Wonder Woman to recruit and assemble Flash, Cyborg and Aquaman to fight the powerful new enemy.

poster.caption: Ben Affleck, Jeremy Irons, Amy Adams, Henry Cavill, Jason Momoa, Gal Gadot, Ezra Miller, and Ray Fisher in Justice League (2017)

movies.plot: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

poster.caption: Jack Black, Kevin Hart, Dwayne Johnson, and Karen Gillan in Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017)

movies.title: The Shape of Water
movies.plot: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

poster.caption: Doug Jones and Sally Hawkins in The Shape of Water (2017)

movies.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
movies.plot: After the Kingsman's headquarters is destroyed and the world is held hostage, an allied spy organization in the United States is discovered. These two elite secret agencies must band together to defeat a common enemy.

poster.caption: Colin Firth, Julianne Moore, Mark Strong, Channing Tatum, and Taron Egerton in Kingsman: The Golden Circle (2017)

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
movies.originalTitle: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
movies.plot: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the Trident of Poseidon to rule the sea while being pursued by old rival Captain Salazar and a crew of deadly ghosts who have escaped from the Devil's Triangle.

movies.title: Kong: Skull Island
movies.plot: After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

poster.caption: Kong: Skull Island (2017)

movies.title: Lady Bird
movies.plot: A fiercely independent teenager tries to make her own way in the world while wanting to get out of her hometown of Sacramento, California, and to get away from her complicated mother and recently-unemployed father.

poster.caption: Saoirse Ronan in Lady Bird (2017)

movies.title: Beauty and the Beast
movies.plot: A brave, beautiful, and brilliant young woman is imprisoned by a beast in his castle. Despite her fears, she learns to see beyond the beast's hideous exterior and realize the gentle heart of the true prince within him.

poster.caption: Kevin Kline, Ewan McGregor, Emma Thompson, Stanley Tucci, Ian McKellen, Audra McDonald, Emma Watson, Josh Gad, Dan Stevens, Luke Evans, and Gugu Mbatha-Raw in Beauty and the Beast (2017)

movies.title: Call Me by Your Name
movies.plot: In the summer of 1983, 17-year-old Elio is spending the days with his family at their villa in Lombardy, Italy. He soon meets 24-year-old Oliver, an intern working for Elio's father. They discover the heady beauty of awakening desire.

poster.caption: Armie Hammer and Timothée Chalamet in Call Me by Your Name (2017)

movies.title: The Greatest Showman

poster.caption: Alien: Covenant (2017)

movies.title: War for the Planet of the Apes

poster.caption: Andy Serkis and Amiah Miller in War for the Planet of the Apes (2017)

movies.title: Murder on the Orient Express

poster.caption: Kenneth Branagh, Johnny Depp, Michelle Pfeiffer, Willem Dafoe, Judi Dench, Penélope Cruz, Josh Gad, Leslie Odom Jr., and Daisy Ridley in Murder on the Orient Express (2017)

movies.title: The Fate of the Furious
movies.plot: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism and a betrayal of those closest to him, the crew face trials that will test them as never before.

movies.title: Mother!

movies.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
movies.plot: Michael Bryce, a protection agent, is tasked with protecting Darius Kincaid, one of the world's most famous assassins.

poster.caption: Samuel L. Jackson and Ryan Reynolds in The Hitman's Bodyguard (2017)

movies.title: I, Tonya
movies.plot: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

poster.caption: Margot Robbie in I, Tonya (2017)

movies.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
movies.originalTitle: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
movies.plot: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.

poster.caption: Charlie Hunnam in King Arthur: Legend of the Sword (2017)

movies.title: Darkest Hour
movies.plot: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.

poster.caption: Gary Oldman in Darkest Hour (2017)

movies.title: Ghost in the Shell
movies.plot: In the near future, Major Mira Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

movies.title: The Mummy
movies.plot: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia and terrors that defy human comprehension.

movies.plot: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

movies.title: Wonder
